Class StoreController

    • checkout

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      - the checkout page

    • pay

      @PostMapping("/cart/pay") public String pay(org.springframework.ui.Model model, Principal principal)
      pay for the cart. and clear the cart. user have to login to pay. if the payment is successful, redirect to the main page. else redirect to the cart page.
      Parameters:
      model - - the model
      principal - - the principal
      Returns:
      - the main page
